message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $10000 to us. To make this opportunity more attractive to you, I am offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This exclusive offer is valid for a limited time only, so I encourage you to consider this proposal promptly. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.
